cast.overview: A respected priest volunteers for an experimental procedure that may lead to a cure for a deadly virus. He gets infected and dies, but a blood transfusion of unknown origin brings him back to life. Now, he’s torn between faith and bloodlust, and has a newfound desire for the wife of a childhood friend.
cast.title: Thirst

details.biography: Natallia Bulynia was born in Belarus. She studied International relations at Belarus State University. After receiving a degree at age 20 she moved to South Korea, Seoul where she started her acting career. During her stay in Korea, she worked in theatre, film and TV. She did various dramas, films including Angry Painter, Lena, The last Princess, Taxi Driver, Real. She studied acting at Chung-Ang University and earned an MA in Performing arts. Since 2018, she lives and works in London, United Kingdom. She is fluent in English, Russian, Belarussian, and Korean languages.
details.name: Natallia Bulynia
